```{r,message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(GEOmetadb)
library(DBI)
library(RSQLite)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
con <- dbConnect(drv = RSQLite::SQLite(), "git/Data/GEOmetadb.sqlite")
```

```{r}
dbListFields(con, "gsm")
```


```{r}
hsa_retina_ngs <- dbGetQuery(conn = con, 
           statement = "select gse.gse, gse.title, gse.summary, 
           gse.pubmed_id, gpl.gpl, gpl.technology, gsm.gsm, 
           gsm.source_name_ch1, gsm.organism_ch1, gsm.molecule_ch1
           from gsm 
           join gse_gsm on gsm.gsm=gse_gsm.gsm 
           join gse on gse_gsm.gse=gse.gse 
           join gse_gpl on gse_gpl.gse=gse.gse 
           join gpl on gse_gpl.gpl=gpl.gpl 
           where gsm.organism_ch1 = 'Homo sapiens' 
           and gpl.technology='high-throughput sequencing' 
           and gse.summary like '%retina%'")
```


```{r}
hsa_retina_ngs %>% 
    distinct(gse, gsm, .keep_all = T) %>% 
    filter(grepl("Fetal", source_name_ch1)) %>% 
    select(gse, title, molecule_ch1)
```
